info.title: spall
info.description: Local semantic note store with embeddings

get.description: List all note paths in a project.
List notes under a path prefix with keyset pagination. Returns full note content.
Get a note by path within a project.

put.description: Create or update a note by path. Creates if not exists, updates if exists.

post.description: Get or create a project. Returns existing project if name matches, creates new one otherwise.

get.description: Look up a project by name or id. Returns default project if neither specified.

delete.description: Delete a project and all associated notes by ID.

post.description: Scan a directory, add matching notes to path, remove non-matches
Add a note to a project and embed it. Requires project ID.

get.description: Get a note by its globally unique ID.

put.description: Update a note's content by ID. Re-embeds the content.

post.description: Create a query scope for aggregating notes across multiple projects.

get.description: List notes across all projects in a query with keyset pagination.
Search note content across all projects in a query using FTS5.

post.description: Scan a directory and embed all matching notes. Streams progress events.
Add a note to a project and embed it. Streams progress events.

put.description: Create or update a note by path. Streams progress events.
Update a note's content by ID. Re-embeds the content. Streams progress events.

get.description: Check if the server is running
Subscribe to all server events via SSE
